title: Managing Assets with Martian Wallet
description: Explore Martian Wallet, a popular non-custodial wallet for Aptos that offers a secure and intuitive way to manage your APT and other tokens, connect to dApps, and participate in the Aptos ecosystem.

tasks.title: Fund Your Martian Wallet
tasks.description: Add at least 0.05 APT to your wallet to begin exploring Martian Wallet features

tasks.title: Martian Wallet Basics
tasks.question: What is Martian Wallet?
options: A hardware wallet device
A centralized exchange wallet
A non-custodial browser extension and mobile wallet for Aptos
A paper wallet generator
tasks.correctAnswer: A non-custodial browser extension and mobile wallet for Aptos

tasks.title: Security Features
tasks.description: Learn about securing your Martian Wallet
tasks.question: What is a key security feature of Martian Wallet?
options: Your private keys are stored on Martian's servers
Your private keys never leave your device and are encrypted
No password is required to access your wallet
Automatic sharing of keys with dApps
tasks.correctAnswer: Your private keys never leave your device and are encrypted

tasks.title: Asset Support
tasks.description: Understanding which assets you can manage
tasks.question: What types of digital assets can you manage with Martian Wallet?
options: Only APT tokens
APT, other tokens on Aptos, and NFTs
Only Bitcoin and Ethereum
Only NFTs, not fungible tokens
tasks.correctAnswer: APT, other tokens on Aptos, and NFTs

tasks.title: DApp Connections
tasks.description: Learn how Martian connects to dApps
tasks.question: How does Martian Wallet allow you to interact with dApps on Aptos?
options: It doesn't support dApp connections
Through secure wallet connect protocol and direct browser extension connections
By sharing your seed phrase with the dApp
Only through complicated manual signing processes
tasks.correctAnswer: Through secure wallet connect protocol and direct browser extension connections

tasks.title: Wallet Recovery
tasks.description: Understanding how to recover access to your wallet
tasks.question: How can you recover access to your Martian Wallet if you lose access to your device?
options: It's impossible to recover
By contacting Martian support with your ID
Using your recovery phrase (seed phrase)
Only by using the same browser/device

tasks.title: Transaction Fees
tasks.description: Learn about fees when using Martian
tasks.question: How does Martian Wallet handle transaction fees?
options: All transactions are free
Martian charges its own fee on top of network fees
Users pay standard Aptos network fees
Fees are paid in MARTIAN tokens only
tasks.correctAnswer: Users pay standard Aptos network fees

tasks.title: Martian vs. Other Wallets
tasks.description: Understanding how Martian compares to other Aptos wallets
tasks.question: What is a feature that might differentiate Martian from other Aptos wallets?
options: It's the only wallet that supports Aptos
Its user-friendly interface and broad ecosystem integrations
It's controlled by the Aptos Foundation
It's the only wallet that allows token transfers
tasks.correctAnswer: Its user-friendly interface and broad ecosystem integrations

tasks.title: Multi-Device Support
tasks.description: Learn about using Martian on multiple devices
tasks.question: How can you use Martian Wallet on multiple devices?
options: It's not possible to use on multiple devices
By creating separate wallets for each device
By importing your recovery phrase on each device
By transferring your tokens between wallets
tasks.correctAnswer: By importing your recovery phrase on each device
